itinerary.mapNote: Gelada baboon territory. First escarpment views. 3260m.
High plateau camp. Walia ibex habitat. 3600m.
Imet Gogo viewpoint 3926m nearby. Best escarpment panorama. 3620m.
High col camp below Ras Dashen massif. 3800m.
Ras Dashen 4550m summit. Drive back to Debark town. 2850m.

waypoints.name: Imet Gogo Viewpoint
waypoints.note: Most dramatic escarpment viewpoint. 1500m vertical drop.

waypoints.name: Ras Dashen Summit
waypoints.note: Highest peak in Ethiopia. 4th highest in Africa.

waypoints.name: Geech Camp Escarpment
waypoints.note: Gelada baboon congregation. Dawn escarpment light.
